member.name: M:Google.PlusButton(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Inserts the code to render a Google+ 'Plus One' button on your page.
member.param: The size of the button to be displayed. Choices are "small", "medium", "standard" and "tall".
The URL of the page to be plus-one'd. If left blank, this will be the canonical URL of your website (if supplied in meta tags) or the URL of this page
True/False variable for whether the total count of plus-ones should be displayed
The name of any custom Javascript Callback function to be called
